title: ЛАПТОП LENOVO LEGION SLIM 5 16IRH8 16" I7-13700H/16GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4060 8GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплей: 16" (40.64cm)
Резолуција:(2560x1600) WQXGA, IPS, 300nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, 165Hz, G-SYNC®, Low Blue Light
Chipset: Intel® SoC Platform
Процесор:Intel® Core™ i7-13700H, 14C (6P + 8E) / 20T, P-core 2.4 / 5.0GHz, E-core 1.8 / 3.7GHz, 24MB
Графика:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4060 8GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2370MHz, TGP 125W
RAM меморија:16GB DDR5-5200
Диск (Storage):1TB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Беж оперативен систем
Аудио: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
Звучници:Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
Камера:FHD 1080p with E-shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Тастатура: White Backlit, English
Wireless:Wi-Fi® 6E, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.1
Порти:
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (Always On)
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/30Hz
1x Card reader
1x Ethernet 100/1000 (RJ-45)
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Power connector
Батерија:
Integrated 80Wh
Power Adapter: 230W Slim Tip (3-pin)

features.audio_feature_1: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
